name: Aerial Maneuver
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+1 and gains flying and first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"When you put all of yourself into an attack, without fear or hesitation, in that instant you may attain greatness."
—Predak, Gateless freemage

name: Angelic Edict
oracle_text: Exile target creature or enchantment.
flavor_text: The Boros built a prison in the sky where Azorius statutes couldn't restrict their sense of justice.

name: Angelic Skirmisher
oracle_text: Flying
At the beginning of each combat, choose first strike, vigilance, or lifelink. Creatures you control gain that ability until end of turn.
flavor_text: "A keen mind wields an army as a deft hand wields a sword."

name: Assault Griffin
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"The Simic offer a prize to any biomancer who can breed a krasis to match a griffin in the air. It's never been claimed."
—Libuse, Boros sergeant

name: Basilica Guards
oracle_text: Defender
Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
flavor_text: "None may pass . . . for free."

name: Blind Obedience
oracle_text: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
Artifacts and creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text: "By the time your knees have worn through your robe, you may have begun to learn your place."

name: Boros Elite
oracle_text: Battalion — Whenever Boros Elite and at least two other creatures attack, Boros Elite gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"First, you must fight among the rank and file. It is there I will discern your skills as a leader."
—Aurelia, to Gideon Jura

name: Court Street Denizen
oracle_text: Whenever another white creature enters the battlefield under your control, tap target creature an opponent controls.
flavor_text: "The Boros fight for justice. The Azorius fight for law. I hold the line between, and make sure the people are given both."

name: Daring Skyjek
oracle_text: Battalion — Whenever Daring Skyjek and at least two other creatures attack, Daring Skyjek gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: "The hard part isn't landing in the saddle. The hard part is leaping before you see it."

name: Debtor's Pulpit
oracle_text: Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Tap target creature."
flavor_text:
"You may not be able to pay. But you can still kneel."
—Milana, Orzhov prelate

name: Dutiful Thrull
oracle_text: {B}: Regenerate Dutiful Thrull.
flavor_text:
"They are useful, but there's little satisfaction in supplication that throws itself under your heel."
—Jozica, Orzhov enforcer

name: Frontline Medic
oracle_text: Battalion — Whenever Frontline Medic and at least two other creatures attack, creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
Sacrifice Frontline Medic: Counter target spell with {X} in its mana cost unless its controller pays {3}.

name: Gideon, Champion of Justice
oracle_text: +1: Put a loyalty counter on Gideon, Champion of Justice for each creature target opponent controls.

0: Until end of turn, Gideon, Champion of Justice becomes a Human Soldier creature with power and toughness each equal to the number of loyalty counters on him and gains indestructible. He's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.
−15: Exile all other permanents.

name: Guardian of the Gateless
oracle_text: Flying
Guardian of the Gateless can block any number of creatures.
Whenever Guardian of the Gateless blocks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature it's blocking.

name: Guildscorn Ward
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has protection from multicolored.
flavor_text:
"The Gateless have risen. The Ten shall fall."
—Ninth District graffiti

name: Hold the Gates
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +0/+1 for each Gate you control and have vigilance.
flavor_text: "We grew up on these streets. We know them better than any Boros grunt from Zelzo."

name: Holy Mantle
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from creatures.
flavor_text:
"The guilds promise to provide safety. I prefer to make my own."
—Briska, Ninth District freemage

name: Knight of Obligation
oracle_text: Vigilance
Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
flavor_text: He can calculate interest to six decimal places even in the midst of a deadly duel.

name: Knight Watch
oracle_text: Create two 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with vigilance.
flavor_text:
"We lost respect after the battle for Barbu Rooftop. Send the troops to mingle respectfully with the citizens."
—Commander Yaszen of Boros

name: Luminate Primordial
oracle_text: Vigilance
When Luminate Primordial enters the battlefield, for each opponent, exile up to one target creature that player controls and that player gains life equal to its power.

name: Murder Investigation
oracle_text: Enchant creature you control
When enchanted creature dies, create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens, where X is its power.
flavor_text: "Every death has a web of consequences. Our job is to find the spider."

name: Nav Squad Commandos
oracle_text: Battalion — Whenever Nav Squad Commandos and at least two other creatures attack, Nav Squad Commandos gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Untap it.
flavor_text: Funded by the Azorius to keep current maps of the undercity, the Boros nav squads survey even the most unsavory areas.

name: Righteous Charge
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "In the name of peace, moderation, and decency—wipe them all out!"

name: Shielded Passage
oracle_text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
flavor_text: Izzet delved into the depths of Ravnica's past, and Selesnya followed without fear.

name: Smite
oracle_text: Destroy target blocked creature.
flavor_text:
"Sure, today of all days, he asked to borrow my boots!"
—Darijo, Ivy Street ruffian

name: Syndic of Tithes
oracle_text: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
flavor_text:
"Entrance is free. Donations are required."
—Notice outside Vizkopa Bank

name: Urbis Protector
oracle_text: When Urbis Protector enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.
flavor_text:
"I hear that Boros is losing its angels to the Gateless Movement. I'm sure this comes as no surprise to you."
—Teysa, to Lazav

name: Zarichi Tiger
oracle_text: {1}{W}, {T}: You gain 2 life.
flavor_text:
"The taming and consecration of these creatures is evidence of our faith."
—Resimir, Zarichi Temple priest

name: Ætherize
oracle_text: Return all attacking creatures to their owner's hand.
flavor_text: "You can come back once you've learned some manners—and figured out how to reconstitute your physical forms."

name: Agoraphobia
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -5/-0.
{2}{U}: Return Agoraphobia to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: "Everyone in this city is choosing sides. I choose inside."

name: Clinging Anemones
oracle_text: Defender
Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

name: Cloudfin Raptor
oracle_text: Flying
Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

name: Diluvian Primordial
oracle_text: Flying

When Diluvian Primordial enters the battlefield, for each opponent, you may cast up to one target instant or sorcery card from that player's graveyard without paying its mana cost. If a card cast this way would be put into a graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

name: Enter the Infinite
oracle_text: Draw cards equal to the number of cards in your library, then put a card from your hand on top of your library. You have no maximum hand size until your next turn.
flavor_text:
"Don't just have an idea—have all of them."
—Niv-Mizzet

name: Frilled Oculus
oracle_text: {1}{G}: Frilled Oculus gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.
flavor_text:
"Understand the Simic? That's about as easy as winning a staring contest with a homunculus."
—Dars Gostok, Firefist captain

name: Gridlock
oracle_text: Tap X target nonland permanents.
flavor_text:
"One tiny peg pulled from a single wagon wheel, and an entire district grinds to a halt."
—Lazav

name: Hands of Binding
oracle_text: Tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

name: Incursion Specialist
oracle_text: Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, Incursion Specialist gets +2/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: "Work for the Dimir again? That depends. Tell me more about this maze."

name: Keymaster Rogue
oracle_text: Keymaster Rogue can't be blocked.
When Keymaster Rogue enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: "This one opens the grate outside Zelzo Base. This one is for Ismeri Library. This one is for an invisible door . . . No, I've said too much."

name: Last Thoughts
oracle_text: Draw a card.

Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

name: Leyline Phantom
oracle_text: When Leyline Phantom deals combat damage, return it to its owner's hand. (Return it only if it survived combat.)
flavor_text:
"Is the maze itself a phantom? Or is one as real as the other? Perhaps I am as mad as the dragon."
—Jace Beleren, journal

name: Metropolis Sprite
oracle_text: Flying
{U}: Metropolis Sprite gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Well, if that goblin didn't want his tongue pierced, he shouldn't have stuck it out at me."

name: Mindeye Drake
oracle_text: Flying
When Mindeye Drake dies, target player puts the top five cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
flavor_text: They can map both the cityscape and the minds of its architects.

name: Rapid Hybridization
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. That creature's controller creates a 3/3 green Frog Lizard creature token.
flavor_text:
"We've merged your life essence with that of several creatures at once. You're welcome."
—Speaker Trifon

name: Realmwright
oracle_text: As Realmwright enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type.
Lands you control are the chosen type in addition to their other types.
flavor_text: There is not a single inch of Ravnica that hasn't been altered at one point or another to fit someone's whims.

name: Sage's Row Denizen
oracle_text: Whenever another blue creature enters the battlefield under your control, target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
flavor_text: "I offer you wisdom untainted by false loyalty, learning free of any guild's agenda."

name: Sapphire Drake
oracle_text: Flying
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has flying.
flavor_text: Sapphire drakes can communicate over great distances, their calls resonating in the gems fixed in their skulls.

name: Scatter Arc
oracle_text: Counter target noncreature spell.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "Should your chosen emissary be able to fluctuate triharmonic pentodes, however unlikely, I shall shunt excess negavolt radicals."

name: Simic Fluxmage
oracle_text: Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
{1}{U}, {T}: Move a +1/+1 counter from Simic Fluxmage onto target creature.

name: Simic Manipulator
oracle_text: Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
{T}, Remove one or more +1/+1 counters from Simic Manipulator: Gain control of target creature with power less than or equal to the number of +1/+1 counters removed this way.

name: Skygames
oracle_text: Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery."
flavor_text: Both Boros and Azorius scout the games in hopes of recruiting the finest athletes.

name: Spell Rupture
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.
flavor_text:
"Like water, mana will drain from an inferior vessel."
—Jalan Tosk, Simic forcemage

name: Stolen Identity
oracle_text: Create a token that's a copy of target artifact or creature.

Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

name: Totally Lost
oracle_text: Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text: Fblthp had always hated crowds.

name: Voidwalk
oracle_text: Exile target creature. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

name: Way of the Thief
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
Enchanted creature can't be blocked as long as you control a Gate.
flavor_text: A true shortcut isn't a way other people don't know; it's a way other people can't go.

name: Balustrade Spy
oracle_text: Flying
When Balustrade Spy enters the battlefield, target player reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a land card, then puts those cards into his or her graveyard.

name: Basilica Screecher
oracle_text: Flying
Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
flavor_text: A screech in the night is all it takes for Orzhov debtors to clutch at their coin purses.

name: Contaminated Ground
oracle_text: Enchant land
Enchanted land is a Swamp.
Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller loses 2 life.
flavor_text:
"No one cares about pollution until they can see it."
—Gurras, Golgari rot farmer

name: Corpse Blockade
oracle_text: Defender
Sacrifice another creature: Corpse Blockade gains deathtouch until end of turn.
flavor_text: There are laws against it, but the dead have no one to complain to and the living are too frightened to investigate.

name: Crypt Ghast
oracle_text: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
Whenever you tap a Swamp for mana, add {B} to your mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).

name: Death's Approach
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -X/-X, where X is the number of creature cards in its controller's graveyard.
flavor_text:
"It's cold in the grave, and the dead crave your warmth. Who are you to deny them?"
—Strava, Dimir mage

name: Devour Flesh
oracle_text: Target player sacrifices a creature, then gains life equal to that creature's toughness.
flavor_text: His twisted mind concluded that if he was what he ate, and he wanted to stay human, . . .

name: Dying Wish
oracle_text: Enchant creature you control
When enchanted creature dies, target player loses X life and you gain X life, where X is its power.
flavor_text: "I wish I could rewrite my every deed and kill you with my first breath instead of my last."

name: Gateway Shade
oracle_text: {B}: Gateway Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Tap an untapped Gate you control: Gateway Shade gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Tireless and merciless, shades are harnessed as spies by the Dimir.

name: Grisly Spectacle
oracle_text: Destroy target nonartifact creature. Its controller puts a number of cards equal to that creature's power from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Watch people flock to a murder scene. Then tell me we're not all a little sick in the head."
—Juri, proprietor of the Juri Revue

name: Gutter Skulk
flavor_text: Upon finding his warehouse infested, Gaven didn't know whether to get an exterminator or an exorcist.

name: Horror of the Dim
oracle_text: {U}: Horror of the Dim gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text:
"Lesser minds can scarcely imagine such a marriage of necromancy and mind magic."
—Strava, Dimir mage

name: Illness in the Ranks
oracle_text: Creature tokens get -1/-1.
flavor_text:
"Selesnya denied us tribute. Let's show them the error of their ways."
—Milana, Orzhov prelate

name: Killing Glare
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power X or less.
flavor_text: A casual glance into a dark corner may be your last.

name: Lord of the Void
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Lord of the Void deals combat damage to a player, exile the top seven cards of that player's library, then put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield under your control.

name: Mental Vapors
oracle_text: Target player discards a card.

Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

name: Midnight Recovery
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

name: Ogre Slumlord
oracle_text: Whenever another nontoken creature dies, you may create a 1/1 black Rat creature token.
Rats you control have deathtouch.
flavor_text:
"His tenement is filled with the most vile, disgusting vermin. It's infested with rats, too."
—Branko One-Ear

name: Sepulchral Primordial
oracle_text: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
When Sepulchral Primordial enters the battlefield, for each opponent, you may put up to one target creature card from that player's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

name: Shadow Alley Denizen
oracle_text: Whenever another black creature enters the battlefield under your control, target creature gains intimidate until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

name: Shadow Slice
oracle_text: Target opponent loses 3 life.

Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

name: Slate Street Ruffian
oracle_text: Whenever Slate Street Ruffian becomes blocked, defending player discards a card.
flavor_text:
"Merciless to the point of psychosis. Let's give him a job."
—Zelinas, Orzhov recruiter

name: Smog Elemental
oracle_text: Flying
Creatures with flying your opponents control get -1/-1.
flavor_text:
"The skies used to be my refuge, a place of peace away from the chaos below. Now, with every flight, death seems to follow me like a shadow."
—Writings of Cica, Skyjek scout

name: Syndicate Enforcer
oracle_text: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
flavor_text: Even the darkest corners of Ravnica still lie in the shadow of the Church.

name: Thrull Parasite
oracle_text: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
{T}, Pay 2 life: Remove a counter from target nonland permanent.
flavor_text: The hunger of a vampire and the subtlety of a tax collector.

name: Undercity Informer
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Target player reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a land card, then puts those cards into his or her graveyard.
flavor_text: "Scandal and slander are never welcome news. That's why I'm never the messenger."

name: Undercity Plague
oracle_text: Target player loses 1 life, discards a card, then sacrifices a permanent.

Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

name: Wight of Precinct Six
oracle_text: Wight of Precinct Six gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your opponents' graveyards.
flavor_text: Even the lost and undead need a protector.

name: Act of Treason
oracle_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
flavor_text: Each day uncertainty and rumors spread, and each night attendance at the Juri Revue increases.

name: Bomber Corps
oracle_text: Battalion — Whenever Bomber Corps and at least two other creatures attack, Bomber Corps deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
flavor_text: "Subtlety is for lawmages and spies."

name: Cinder Elemental
oracle_text: {X}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Cinder Elemental: Cinder Elemental deals X damage to target creature or player.
flavor_text:
"The old gods awoke and sent fingers of fire to see what was left of the old ways under the endless city."
—Daiva, Gruul storyteller

name: Crackling Perimeter
oracle_text: Tap an untapped Gate you control: Crackling Perimeter deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: As the path he sought came into focus, Niv-Mizzet took steps to prevent others from approaching it.

name: Ember Beast
oracle_text: Ember Beast can't attack or block alone.
flavor_text: The only livestock that will survive for long in the Smelting District, ember beasts serve many functions—none of them willingly.

name: Firefist Striker
oracle_text: Battalion — Whenever Firefist Striker and at least two other creatures attack, target creature can't block this turn.
flavor_text: The flaming fist of Boros holds the promise of both protection and destruction in its grasp.

name: Five-Alarm Fire
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage, put a blaze counter on Five-Alarm Fire.
Remove five blaze counters from Five-Alarm Fire: Five-Alarm Fire deals 5 damage to target creature or player.

name: Foundry Street Denizen
oracle_text: Whenever another red creature enters the battlefield under your control, Foundry Street Denizen gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: After the Foundry Street riot, Arrester Hulbein tried to ban bludgeons. Which, inevitably, resulted in another riot.

name: Furious Resistance
oracle_text: Target blocking creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"At least the Gateless rebels have ideals. Rakdos just mocks, defiles, and kills all we hold dear."
—Libuse, Boros sergeant

name: Hellkite Tyrant
oracle_text: Flying, trample
Whenever Hellkite Tyrant deals combat damage to a player, gain control of all artifacts that player controls.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control twenty or more artifacts, you win the game.

name: Hellraiser Goblin
oracle_text: Creatures you control have haste and attack each combat if able.
flavor_text: Don't let him lead the soldiers, but by all means let him lead the way.

name: Homing Lightning
oracle_text: Homing Lightning deals 4 damage to target creature and each other creature with the same name as that creature.
flavor_text:
"I see countless worlds. What makes them think I can't find them in just one?"
—Ral Zarek

name: Legion Loyalist
oracle_text: Haste
Battalion — Whenever Legion Loyalist and at least two other creatures attack, creatures you control gain first strike and trample until end of turn and can't be blocked by creature tokens this turn.

name: Madcap Skills
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text: The larger the crowd, the harder it is for them to run away.

name: Mark for Death
oracle_text: Target creature an opponent controls blocks this turn if able. Untap that creature. Other creatures that player controls can't block this turn.
flavor_text: Everyone roots for the little guy, but nobody bets on him.

name: Massive Raid
oracle_text: Massive Raid deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of creatures you control.
flavor_text:
"The Boros lack vision. Give them a convenient scapegoat and they'll be blind to the true threats."
—Lazav

name: Molten Primordial
oracle_text: Haste

When Molten Primordial enters the battlefield, for each opponent, gain control of up to one target creature that player controls until end of turn. Untap those creatures. They gain haste until end of turn.

name: Mugging
oracle_text: Mugging deals 2 damage to target creature. That creature can't block this turn.
flavor_text: Scream: muffled. Pockets: emptied. Neck function: never the same again.

name: Ripscale Predator
oracle_text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text: As Ravnica's wilds expanded, even advocates for nature had to confront fiercer natural threats.

name: Scorchwalker
oracle_text: Bloodrush — {1}{R}{R}, Discard Scorchwalker: Target attacking creature gets +5/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Borborygmos's elemental launched an assault, but the Izzet wards held and experiments continue."
—Skyknight report on the Rubblebelt

name: Skinbrand Goblin
oracle_text: Bloodrush — {R}, Discard Skinbrand Goblin: Target attacking creature gets +2/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"These Gruul skin-runes—discern whether their patterns evoke streets, leylines, or both. You have four days."
—Niv-Mizzet, to his assistant

name: Skullcrack
oracle_text: Players can't gain life this turn. Damage can't be prevented this turn. Skullcrack deals 3 damage to target player.
flavor_text: The lawmage's argument was clever and well reasoned, but Blunk's response proved irrefutable.

name: Structural Collapse
oracle_text: Target player sacrifices an artifact and a land. Structural Collapse deals 2 damage to that player.
flavor_text: The Gruul holiday of Rauck-Chauv always ends the same way.

name: Tin Street Market
oracle_text: Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}, Discard a card: Draw a card."
flavor_text:
"Sometimes I stroll along Tin Street and watch citizens busy with their daily lives. It reminds me why I do my job."
—Arrester Lavinia, Tenth Precinct

name: Towering Thunderfist
oracle_text: {W}: Towering Thunderfist gains vigilance until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Nothing ruins a party like one of those big killjoys bursting through the door and setting all the guests free."
—Ruba, Rakdos cultist

name: Viashino Shanktail
oracle_text: First strike
Bloodrush — {2}{R}, Discard Viashino Shanktail: Target attacking creature gets +3/+1 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: The Slizt Clan's battle cry is an impressive display of fury, defiance, and spit.

name: Warmind Infantry
oracle_text: Battalion — Whenever Warmind Infantry and at least two other creatures attack, Warmind Infantry gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Before Aurelia denounced Niv-Mizzet, the two guilds had collaborated on the Warmind Initiative in pursuit of the ultimate soldier.

name: Wrecking Ogre
oracle_text: Double strike
Bloodrush — {3}{R}{R}, Discard Wrecking Ogre: Target attacking creature gets +3/+3 and gains double strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: If no opponent can be found, ogres of the Bolrac Clan will often pick fights with buildings.

name: Adaptive Snapjaw
oracle_text: Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
flavor_text:
"Eh, needs more toad."
—Gulistan, Simic biomancer

name: Alpha Authority
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has hexproof and can't be blocked by more than one creature.
flavor_text: Even the bitterest enemies of the Burning-Tree Clan respect the strength of Borborygmos's rule.

name: Burst of Strength
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature and untap it.
flavor_text:
"Our fight is not about territory or revenge. It is about freedom, plain and simple."
—Ruric Thar, Ghor-Clan chieftain

name: Crocanura
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

name: Crowned Ceratok
oracle_text: Trample
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.
flavor_text: The best way to calm a rampaging ceratok is to wait until it dies of natural causes.

name: Disciple of the Old Ways
oracle_text: {R}: Disciple of the Old Ways gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Selesnya thinks nature is a pretty plaything. True nature would rip their faces off and wear their skins as trophies."

name: Experiment One
oracle_text: Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
Remove two +1/+1 counters from Experiment One: Regenerate Experiment One.

name: Forced Adaptation
oracle_text: Enchant creature
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.
flavor_text:
"We're planting the seeds of change. Sometimes, we plant them in people."
—Vorel of the Hull Clade

name: Giant Adephage
oracle_text: Trample
Whenever Giant Adephage deals combat damage to a player, create a token that's a copy of Giant Adephage.
flavor_text:
"To a creature like that, we must seem like, well, bugs."
—Dars Gostok, Firefist captain

name: Greenside Watcher
oracle_text: {T}: Untap target Gate.
flavor_text: "The Izzet may incite war, but my duty is here. I will not abandon the wild."

name: Gyre Sage
oracle_text: Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool for each +1/+1 counter on Gyre Sage.

name: Hindervines
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures with no +1/+1 counters on them.
flavor_text:
"Woodlands and laws. Both grow faster than the Azorius's ability to manage them."
—Suniel the Woodwise

name: Ivy Lane Denizen
oracle_text: Whenever another green creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text: "Skyknight gear? Well, I have drake-skin gauntlets, supple and fireproof. Or a ceratok chestplate that'll stop a crossbow bolt."

name: Miming Slime
oracle_text: Create an X/X green Ooze creature token, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.
flavor_text:
"We paid the Simic very well for this capability, but we should quickly recoup our expenses in saved wages."
—Milana, Orzhov prelate

name: Naturalize
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"And if you threaten me again, your shiny steel trousers will be sprouting daggerthorn vines."
—Iveta, rooftop runner

name: Ooze Flux
oracle_text: {1}{G}, Remove one or more +1/+1 counters from among creatures you control: Create an X/X green Ooze creature token, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters removed this way.

name: Predator's Rapport
oracle_text: Choose target creature you control. You gain life equal to that creature's power plus its toughness.
flavor_text:
"Other guilds say the Gruul are savages, no better than the beasts we live with. I say we've found friends who won't stab us in the back."
—Domri Rade

name: Rust Scarab
oracle_text: Whenever Rust Scarab becomes blocked, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment defending player controls.
flavor_text:
"Behold nature's answer to the problem of society."
—Nikya of the Old Ways

name: Scab-Clan Charger
oracle_text: Bloodrush — {1}{G}, Discard Scab-Clan Charger: Target attacking creature gets +2/+4 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "The only roads I wish to see are those beaten flat by wild hooves."

name: Serene Remembrance
oracle_text: Shuffle Serene Remembrance and up to three target cards from a single graveyard into their owners' libraries.
flavor_text: While Lazav schemed and Niv-Mizzet researched, Trostani sought the future in the whispers of the past.

name: Skarrg Goliath
oracle_text: Trample
Bloodrush — {5}{G}{G}, Discard Skarrg Goliath: Target attacking creature gets +9/+9 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"They bind us with their laws. We free ourselves with nature's fist."
—Nikya of the Old Ways

name: Slaughterhorn
oracle_text: Bloodrush — {G}, Discard Slaughterhorn: Target attacking creature gets +3/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The Orzhov clergy would never cross its path, but sending thrull couriers to do so is cheap and entertaining.

name: Spire Tracer
oracle_text: Spire Tracer can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.
flavor_text: Cartographers on Ravnica chart not just the horizontal, but also the vertical.

name: Sylvan Primordial
oracle_text: Reach

When Sylvan Primordial enters the battlefield, for each opponent, destroy target noncreature permanent that player controls. For each permanent destroyed this way, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

name: Tower Defense
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +0/+5 and gain reach until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The drakes are practice. We may one day need to bring down a sky swallower, or maybe even Rakdos himself."
—Korun Nar, Rubblebelt hunter

name: Verdant Haven
oracle_text: Enchant land
When Verdant Haven enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds one mana of any color to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).

name: Wasteland Viper
oracle_text: Deathtouch
Bloodrush — {G}, Discard Wasteland Viper: Target attacking creature gets +1/+2 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The Gruul embrace all things poisonous and living in the cracks of society."
—Teysa Karlov, Grand Envoy of Orzhov

name: Wildwood Rebirth
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: In Ravnica, there are maladies far more difficult to treat than death.

name: Alms Beast
oracle_text: Creatures blocking or blocked by Alms Beast have lifelink.
flavor_text: Alms-coins are only redeemable at Orzhov businesses.

name: Assemble the Legion
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a muster counter on Assemble the Legion. Then create a 1/1 red and white Soldier creature token with haste for each muster counter on Assemble the Legion.

name: Aurelia, the Warleader
oracle_text: Flying, vigilance, haste
Whenever Aurelia, the Warleader attacks for the first time each turn, untap all creatures you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.
flavor_text: Where Razia was aloof and untouchable, Aurelia is on the frontlines, calling for war.

name: Aurelia's Fury
oracle_text: Aurelia's Fury deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players. Tap each creature dealt damage this way. Players dealt damage this way can't cast noncreature spells this turn.

name: Bane Alley Broker
oracle_text: {T}: Draw a card, then exile a card from your hand face down.
You may look at cards exiled with Bane Alley Broker.
{U}{B}, {T}: Return a card exiled with Bane Alley Broker to its owner's hand.

name: Biovisionary
oracle_text: At the beginning of the end step, if you control four or more creatures named Biovisionary, you win the game.
flavor_text: He tired of his fellow researchers and their useless prattling, so he decided to make a network of scholars with whom he could carry a conversation.

name: Borborygmos Enraged
oracle_text: Trample
Whenever Borborygmos Enraged deals combat damage to a player, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
Discard a land card: Borborygmos Enraged deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

name: Boros Charm
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Boros Charm deals 4 damage to target player.
• Permanents you control gain indestructible until end of turn.
• Target creature gains double strike until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Practice compassion and mercy. But know when they must end."
—Aurelia

name: Call of the Nightwing
oracle_text: Create a 1/1 blue and black Horror creature token with flying.

Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

name: Cartel Aristocrat
oracle_text: Sacrifice another creature: Cartel Aristocrat gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Your life serves a higher purpose now: ensuring the continuation of my own."

name: Clan Defiance
oracle_text: Choose one or more —
• Clan Defiance deals X damage to target creature with flying.
• Clan Defiance deals X damage to target creature without flying.
• Clan Defiance deals X damage to target player.

name: Consuming Aberration
oracle_text: Consuming Aberration's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your opponents' graveyards.
Whenever you cast a spell, each opponent reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a land card, then puts those cards into his or her graveyard.

name: Deathpact Angel
oracle_text: Flying

When Deathpact Angel dies, create a 1/1 white and black Cleric creature token. It has "{3}{W}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Return a card named Deathpact Angel from your graveyard to the battlefield."

name: Dimir Charm
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Counter target sorcery spell.
• Destroy target creature with power 2 or less.
• Look at the top three cards of target player's library, then put one back and the rest into that player's graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Dangerous to recognize. Deadly not to."
—Lazav

name: Dinrova Horror
oracle_text: When Dinrova Horror enters the battlefield, return target permanent to its owner's hand, then that player discards a card.
flavor_text:
"Welcome to the Dimir Public Offices. Not responsible for death or loss of property. Basement off-limits."
—Sign outside Dinrova Building

name: Domri Rade
oracle_text: +1: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.
−2: Target creature you control fights another target creature.
−7: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control have double strike, trample, hexproof, and haste."

name: Drakewing Krasis
oracle_text: Flying, trample
flavor_text: Cautious not to repeat Vig's mistakes, the Simic fuse life essences using magic alone. Each result is called a krasis.

name: Duskmantle Guildmage
oracle_text: {1}{U}{B}: Whenever a card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere this turn, that player loses 1 life.
{2}{U}{B}: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

name: Duskmantle Seer
oracle_text: Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, each player reveals the top card of his or her library, loses life equal to that card's converted mana cost, then puts it into his or her hand.

name: Elusive Krasis
oracle_text: Elusive Krasis can't be blocked.
Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

name: Executioner's Swing
oracle_text: Target creature that dealt damage this turn gets -5/-5 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "The contract specified an appendage for a missed payment. Read the fine print: the head is an appendage."

name: Fathom Mage
oracle_text: Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
Whenever a +1/+1 counter is placed on Fathom Mage, you may draw a card.

name: Firemane Avenger
oracle_text: Flying
Battalion — Whenever Firemane Avenger and at least two other creatures attack, Firemane Avenger deals 3 damage to target creature or player and you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: Firemane Nevena led the victorious assault on the Barbu Rooftop rebels. Now the Gateless have marked her for death.

name: Fortress Cyclops
oracle_text: Whenever Fortress Cyclops attacks, it gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
Whenever Fortress Cyclops blocks, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"They think they tamed him, but he will always be a wild titan, a force of nature."
—Nedja, Gruul shaman

name: Foundry Champion
oracle_text: When Foundry Champion enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of creatures you control.
{R}: Foundry Champion gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
{W}: Foundry Champion gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

name: Frenzied Tilling
oracle_text: Destroy target land. Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text:
"Izzet contraptions pollute our lands. Burn them down, kill the makers, cleanse the earth."
—Nedja, Gruul shaman

name: Ghor-Clan Rampager
oracle_text: Trample
Bloodrush — {R}{G}, Discard Ghor-Clan Rampager: Target attacking creature gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The Simic come from the cold slow depths. How could they understand the fire in a wild heart?"
—Kroshkar, Gruul shaman

name: Ground Assault
oracle_text: Ground Assault deals damage to target creature equal to the number of lands you control.
flavor_text:
"Taking down a dragon is easy. All you need is enough space to get in a good swing."
—Narbulg Nine Fingers

name: Gruul Charm
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Creatures without flying can't block this turn.
• Gain control of all permanents you own.
• Gruul Charm deals 3 damage to each creature with flying.
flavor_text:
"Not Gruul? Then die!"
—Borborygmos

name: Gruul Ragebeast
oracle_text: Whenever Gruul Ragebeast or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, that creature fights target creature an opponent controls.
flavor_text:
"If the other guilds want a war, they should know we've been ready the whole time."
—Ruric Thar, Ghor-Clan chieftain

name: High Priest of Penance
oracle_text: Whenever High Priest of Penance is dealt damage, you may destroy target nonland permanent.
flavor_text: "All I require is faith, loyalty, obedience, trust, and complete and utter devotion."

name: Hydroform
oracle_text: Target land becomes a 3/3 Elemental creature with flying until end of turn. It's still a land.
flavor_text:
"While the sea may be our home, the sky is our destiny."
—Prime Speaker Zegana

name: Kingpin's Pet
oracle_text: Flying
Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
flavor_text:
"Debt and death sound so similar, and thrulls are so hard of hearing. Mistakes are inevitable."
—Milana, Orzhov prelate

name: Lazav, Dimir Mastermind
oracle_text: Hexproof

Whenever a creature card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, you may have Lazav, Dimir Mastermind become a copy of that card, except its name is still Lazav, Dimir Mastermind, it's legendary in addition to its other types, and it gains hexproof and this ability.

name: Martial Glory
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
Target creature gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Yes, Boros tactics are unparalleled. But when your comrades are dying around you, inner strength must carry the day."
—Gideon Jura, to Aurelia

name: Master Biomancer
oracle_text: Each other creature you control enters the battlefield with a number of additional +1/+1 counters on it equal to Master Biomancer's power and as a Mutant in addition to its other types.
flavor_text: "Nature is a wonderful engineer but works far too slowly for my tastes."

name: Merciless Eviction
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Exile all artifacts.
• Exile all creatures.
• Exile all enchantments.
• Exile all planeswalkers.
flavor_text:
"I once saw the Obzedat moved to action. Since that day, I've been thankful that they're mainly lazy, and dead."
—Aurelia, to Gideon Jura

name: Mind Grind
oracle_text: Each opponent reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals X land cards, then puts all cards revealed this way into his or her graveyard. X can't be 0.

name: Mortus Strider
oracle_text: When Mortus Strider dies, return it to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Dimir's best agents hide from death itself.

name: Mystic Genesis
oracle_text: Counter target spell. Create an X/X green Ooze creature token, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.
flavor_text:
"The Simic can grow anything out of a puddle of sludge. I just hope they never join forces with the Golgari."
—Teysa Karlov, Grand Envoy of Orzhov

name: Nimbus Swimmer
oracle_text: Flying
Nimbus Swimmer enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
flavor_text: The Simic soon discovered that the sky offered as few constraints on size as the sea.

name: Obzedat, Ghost Council
oracle_text: When Obzedat, Ghost Council enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
At the beginning of your end step, you may exile Obzedat. If you do, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of your next upkeep. It gains haste.

name: One Thousand Lashes
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player loses 1 life.

name: Ordruun Veteran
oracle_text: Battalion — Whenever Ordruun Veteran and at least two other creatures attack, Ordruun Veteran gains double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
flavor_text: "My father was Gruul, but I chose the precision of the legion over the fury of the pack."

name: Orzhov Charm
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Return target creature you control and all Auras you control attached to it to their owner's hand.
• Destroy target creature and you lose life equal to its toughness.
• Return target creature card with converted mana cost 1 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Paranoid Delusions
oracle_text: Target player puts the top three cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

name: Primal Visitation
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has haste.
flavor_text: Gruul shamans believe all sentient beings have the soul of savagery inside them, an animal form clawing to escape.

name: Prime Speaker Zegana
oracle_text: Prime Speaker Zegana enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the greatest power among other creatures you control.
When Prime Speaker Zegana enters the battlefield, draw cards equal to its power.

name: Psychic Strike
oracle_text: Counter target spell. Its controller puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
flavor_text: Until more information could be gleaned about Niv-Mizzet's intentions, Lazav took every opportunity to stall his experiments.

name: Purge the Profane
oracle_text: Target opponent discards two cards and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: The Orzhov hear the plans of the other guilds through the guilty thoughts of the disloyal.

name: Rubblehulk
oracle_text: Rubblehulk's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.
Bloodrush — {1}{R}{G}, Discard Rubblehulk: Target attacking creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of lands you control.

name: Ruination Wurm
flavor_text: When the architects of Ravnica claim a structure will stand against a wurm, they never mention for how long.

name: Shambleshark
oracle_text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

name: Signal the Clans
oracle_text: Search your library for three creature cards and reveal them. If you reveal three cards with different names, choose one of them at random and put that card into your hand. Shuffle the rest into your library.
flavor_text: Gruul clanfolk obey few rules, but all feel bound to answer the call of the horn.

name: Simic Charm
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
• Permanents you control gain hexproof until end of turn.
• Return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"We measure our progress in heartbeats."
—Prime Speaker Zegana

name: Skarrg Guildmage
oracle_text: {R}{G}: Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.
{1}{R}{G}: Target land you control becomes a 4/4 Elemental creature until end of turn. It's still a land.

name: Skyknight Legionnaire
oracle_text: Flying, haste
flavor_text: Millennium Platform, once a monument to peace, was quickly seized by the skyknights for its strategic aerial location.

name: Soul Ransom
oracle_text: Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.
Discard two cards: Soul Ransom's controller sacrifices it, then draws two cards. Only any opponent may activate this ability.

name: Spark Trooper
oracle_text: Trample, lifelink, haste
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Spark Trooper.
flavor_text: Izzet-designed conductors atop Sunhome charge empty sets of armor that give form to the fluctuating elementals.

name: Sunhome Guildmage
oracle_text: {1}{R}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
{2}{R}{W}: Create a 1/1 red and white Soldier creature token with haste.

name: Treasury Thrull
oracle_text: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
Whenever Treasury Thrull attacks, you may return target artifact, creature, or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Truefire Paladin
oracle_text: Vigilance
{R}{W}: Truefire Paladin gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
{R}{W}: Truefire Paladin gains first strike until end of turn.

name: Unexpected Results
oracle_text: Shuffle your library, then reveal the top card. If it's a nonland card, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield and return Unexpected Results to its owner's hand.

name: Urban Evolution
oracle_text: Draw three cards. You may play an additional land this turn.
flavor_text: As the Simic released more of their krasis experiments, they required new habitats, always at the expense of the locals.

name: Vizkopa Confessor
oracle_text: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
When Vizkopa Confessor enters the battlefield, pay any amount of life. Target opponent reveals that many cards from his or her hand. You choose one of them and exile it.

name: Vizkopa Guildmage
oracle_text: {1}{W}{B}: Target creature gains lifelink until end of turn.
{1}{W}{B}: Whenever you gain life this turn, each opponent loses that much life.

name: Whispering Madness
oracle_text: Each player discards his or her hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way.

Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

name: Wojek Halberdiers
oracle_text: Battalion — Whenever Wojek Halberdiers and at least two other creatures attack, Wojek Halberdiers gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: Tired of Boros interference, the Rakdos unleashed hellraiser goblins, hoping their corpses would weigh down the halberds.

name: Zameck Guildmage
oracle_text: {G}{U}: This turn, each creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
{G}{U}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Draw a card.

name: Zhur-Taa Swine
oracle_text: Bloodrush — {1}{R}{G}, Discard Zhur-Taa Swine: Target attacking creature gets +5/+4 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Gurley was the first to domesticate one, though his widow didn't take much solace in that accomplishment.

name: Arrows of Justice
oracle_text: Arrows of Justice deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text: Archers from the Horizon Military Academy hone their skills by targeting pickpockets blocks away.

name: Beckon Apparition
oracle_text: Exile target card from a graveyard. Create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.
flavor_text: The foyer is littered with the coins it demands but can no longer hold.

name: Biomass Mutation
oracle_text: Creatures you control have base power and toughness X/X until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"A regression to ancient forms? A glimpse of future evolutions? Or a fleeting alteration of the present?"
—Vorel of the Hull Clade

name: Bioshift
oracle_text: Move any number of +1/+1 counters from target creature onto another target creature with the same controller.
flavor_text:
"It's all right if you change your mind. There's always a chance we can rearrange parts later."
—Zija, Simic mutationist

name: Boros Reckoner
oracle_text: Whenever Boros Reckoner is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target creature or player.
{R/W}: Boros Reckoner gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Imagine a thunderstorm that's also a tactical genius. That's him."
—Dars Gostok, Firefist captain

name: Burning-Tree Emissary
oracle_text: When Burning-Tree Emissary enters the battlefield, add {R}{G} to your mana pool.
flavor_text: Those who regard the Gruul as savage simpletons underestimate the subtle power of their shamans.

name: Coerced Confession
oracle_text: Target player puts the top four cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. You draw a card for each creature card put into that graveyard this way.
flavor_text:
"Ask the right questions in the right way and truth is inevitable."
—Lazav

name: Deathcult Rogue
oracle_text: Deathcult Rogue can't be blocked except by Rogues.
flavor_text:
"The hussars can't catch him, and he evades our traps with ease. I fear he walks unseen even in the halls of New Prahv."
—Arrester Lavinia, Tenth Precinct

name: Gift of Orzhova
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying and lifelink.
flavor_text:
"Remember by whose gift you ascend."
—Milana, Orzhov prelate

name: Immortal Servitude
oracle_text: Return each creature card with converted mana cost X from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"The fine print of countless contracts has ensured we are never defenseless."
—Teysa Karlov, Grand Envoy of Orzhov

name: Merfolk of the Depths
oracle_text: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
flavor_text: When giant sinkholes opened across Ravnica, they revealed buried oceans and the merfolk, once thought to be extinct.

name: Nightveil Specter
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Nightveil Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of his or her library.
You may play cards exiled with Nightveil Specter.

name: Pit Fight
oracle_text: Target creature you control fights another target creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
flavor_text:
"All the coins in Ravnica can't save his soul now."
—Narbulg Nine Fingers

name: Rubblebelt Raiders
oracle_text: Whenever Rubblebelt Raiders attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each attacking creature you control.
flavor_text:
"This city will perish, and the Gruul will cheer as the boar-god crushes the last bricks into dust."
—Nikya of the Old Ways

name: Shattering Blow
oracle_text: Exile target artifact.
flavor_text:
"Aurelia seems too eager to solve her problems by delivering them to oblivion."
—Prime Speaker Zegana

name: Armored Transport
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to Armored Transport by creatures blocking it.
flavor_text:
"If only our jails were as secure."
—Arrester Lavinia, Tenth Precinct

name: Boros Keyrune
oracle_text: {T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.
{R}{W}: Boros Keyrune becomes a 1/1 red and white Soldier artifact creature with double strike until end of turn. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

name: Dimir Keyrune
oracle_text: {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.
{U}{B}: Dimir Keyrune becomes a 2/2 blue and black Horror artifact creature until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: A key that slips through every lock.

name: Glaring Spotlight
oracle_text: Creatures your opponents control with hexproof can be the targets of spells and abilities you control as though they didn't have hexproof.
{3}, Sacrifice Glaring Spotlight: Creatures you control gain hexproof until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.

name: Gruul Keyrune
oracle_text: {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.
{R}{G}: Gruul Keyrune becomes a 3/2 red and green Beast artifact creature with trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: As perilous and unpredictable as the wilds themselves.

name: Illusionist's Bracers
oracle_text: Whenever an ability of equipped creature is activated, if it isn't a mana ability, copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy.
Equip {3}
flavor_text: It's easy to believe you're a god when you're twice as powerful as everyone else.

name: Millennial Gargoyle
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"You've got to keep your wits about you on the roofs. Not all stones are compliant handholds."
—Iveta, rooftop runner

name: Orzhov Keyrune
oracle_text: {T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool.
{W}{B}: Orzhov Keyrune becomes a 1/4 white and black Thrull artifact creature with lifelink until end of turn.
flavor_text: You only need to wield it once to appreciate the power of control.

name: Prophetic Prism
oracle_text: When Prophetic Prism enters the battlefield, draw a card.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
flavor_text: To understand Ravnica, one must first understand how each guild contributes to its stability.

name: Razortip Whip
oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Razortip Whip deals 1 damage to target opponent.
flavor_text:
"It no longer surprises me what shows up in our raid of a Rakdos revue."
—Janik Bara, Wojek captain

name: Riot Gear
oracle_text: Equipped creature gets +1/+2.
Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: Any meeting between guilds requires proper equipment.

name: Simic Keyrune
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool.
{G}{U}: Simic Keyrune becomes a 2/3 green and blue Crab artifact creature with hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

name: Skyblinder Staff
oracle_text: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and can't be blocked by creatures with flying.
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: "If bats are the only thing between me and a mountain of Orzhov coins, then I'm about to be a very rich thief."

oracle_text: Boros Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.
flavor_text: Enter with merciful hearts. Exit with battle cries.
